trans-unit.source: Draws a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen*>.

Use the GeometryDrawing class with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> to paint an object with a shape, with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> to create clip art, or with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>.
Freezable Features A GeometryDrawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
The brush used to fill this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>.
The pen used to stroke this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>.
The geometry
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to fill the interior of the shape described by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush used to fill this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that describes the shape of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The shape described by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Geometry*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> used to stroke this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The pen used to stroke this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing"></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen*> dependency property.
To be added.
